info.name: VnR Identity - OAuth 2.0 and OpenID Connect

request.description: For more information about this API refer: [https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/v3.0/reference/post_oauth2-authorize-app-id-](https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/v3.0/reference/post_oauth2-authorize-app-id-)
For more information about this API refer: [https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/reference/post_oauth2-token-app-id](https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/reference/post_oauth2-token-app-id)

For more information about this API refer: [https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/reference/post_oauth2-authorize-app-id-](https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/reference/post_oauth2-authorize-app-id-)
For more information about this API refer: [https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/reference/post_oauth2-token-app-id](https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/reference/post_oauth2-token-app-id)

For more information about this API refer: [https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/reference/post_oauth2-authorize-app-id-](https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/reference/post_oauth2-authorize-app-id-)

For more information about this API refer: [https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/reference/post_oauth2-authorize-app-id-](https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/reference/post_oauth2-authorize-app-id-)
For more information about this API refer: [https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/reference/post_oauth2-token-app-id](https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/reference/post_oauth2-token-app-id)
For more information about this API refer: [https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/reference/post_oauth2-token-app-id](https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/reference/post_oauth2-token-app-id)

Please refer to the documentation link to setup OpenID Connect custom app in CyberArk Identity - [https://docs.cyberark.com/Product-Doc/OnlineHelp/Idaptive/Latest/en/Content/Applications/AppsCustom/CustOpenID.htm](https://docs.cyberark.com/Product-Doc/OnlineHelp/Idaptive/Latest/en/Content/Applications/AppsCustom/CustOpenID.htm)

Please refer to the documentation on how to use refresh tokens: [https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/docs/refresh-tokens-1](https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/docs/refresh-tokens-1)

For more information on the CyberArk Identity OIDC APIs please refer to: [https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/reference/post_oauth2-token-app-id](https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/reference/post_oauth2-token-app-id)

**Pre-requisites**:

We need to configure the OpenID Connect custom app in CyberArk Identity and generate a refresh token using any of the grants in OIDC.

Please refer to the documentation link to setup OpenID Connect custom app in CyberArk Identity - [https://docs.cyberark.com/Product-Doc/OnlineHelp/Idaptive/Latest/en/Content/Applications/AppsCustom/CustOpenID.htm](https://docs.cyberark.com/Product-Doc/OnlineHelp/Idaptive/Latest/en/Content/Applications/AppsCustom/CustOpenID.htm)

Please refer to the documentation on how to use userinfo endpoint: [https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/docs/userinfo-endpoint](https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/docs/userinfo-endpoint)

For more information on the CyberArk Identity userinfo API please refer to: [https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/reference/post_oauth2-userinfo-app-id](https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/reference/post_oauth2-userinfo-app-id)

**Pre-requisites**:

We need to configure the OpenID Connect custom app in CyberArk Identity and generate an access token using any of the grants in OIDC.

Please refer to the documentation link to setup the OpenID Connect custom app in CyberArk Identity - [https://docs.cyberark.com/Product-Doc/OnlineHelp/Idaptive/Latest/en/Content/Applications/AppsCustom/CustOpenID.htm](https://docs.cyberark.com/Product-Doc/OnlineHelp/Idaptive/Latest/en/Content/Applications/AppsCustom/CustOpenID.htm)

For more information on this API please refer to: [https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/reference/post_oauth2-introspect-app-id](https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/reference/post_oauth2-introspect-app-id)

**Pre-requisites**:

We need to configure the OpenID Connect custom app in CyberArk Identity.

Please refer to the documentation link to setup the OpenID Connect custom app in CyberArk Identity - [https://docs.cyberark.com/Product-Doc/OnlineHelp/Idaptive/Latest/en/Content/Applications/AppsCustom/CustOpenID.htm](https://docs.cyberark.com/Product-Doc/OnlineHelp/Idaptive/Latest/en/Content/Applications/AppsCustom/CustOpenID.htmFor)

For more information on how to use revoke token API refer to: [https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/docs/revoke-tokens](https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/docs/revoke-tokens)

For more information on this API please refer to: [https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/reference/post_oauth2-revoke-app-id](https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/reference/post_oauth2-revoke-app-id)

**Pre-requisites**:

We need to configure the OpenID Connect custom app in CyberArk Identity.

Please refer to the documentation link to setup the OpenID Connect custom app in CyberArk Identity - [https://docs.cyberark.com/Product-Doc/OnlineHelp/Idaptive/Latest/en/Content/Applications/AppsCustom/CustOpenID.htm](https://docs.cyberark.com/Product-Doc/OnlineHelp/Idaptive/Latest/en/Content/Applications/AppsCustom/CustOpenID.htmFor)

For more information on how to use revoke token API refer to: [https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/docs/end-openid-connect-session-on-cyberark-identity](https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/docs/end-openid-connect-session-on-cyberark-identity)

For more information on this API please refer to: [https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/reference/post_oauth2-endsession-app-id](https://identity-developer.cyberark.com/reference/post_oauth2-endsession-app-id)

**Pre-requisites**:

We need to configure the OpenID Connect custom app in CyberArk Identity.
